div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die mensis
Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day viij dais to Alexander ramsay to
preiwe Wat glenny his feit seruand'

The said' day the seref deput and the balyeis assignit this day viij dais
to gilbert menyeis one that ane part Ande margaret crafurde the relict
of vmquhile Alexander red' one that vthir part to comper befor thame for
the ministracion' of Justice anent the Souerte and caucioun' to be tane
for margaret marion' rede dochtir and ayr tile vmquhile the saide Alexander rede and hir'
gudis eftir the tenor of our Souerane lordis lettres direct' tharapon'

The said' day thome leslie fand' ane borghe' in the handis of Williame
scrimgeour officiar' that Jok frostar awche to pas' as witnes in the action' of
trubulance betuix him and Adam fyf et cetera Ande Duncane fyf forspekar for
the said' Adam Recounterit the said borghe' allegeand' he suld' nocht
pas at witnes to the assis' becaus' he waus partj principale to the
said' Adam and hed' Complenyet of him for strubulance quhilk
borghe' and Recovntir considirit and vndirstandin It was fundin be warde of the
Court that the borghe was availe and the Recovntir of nayn' availe
And' that was gevin for dome

The said' day Adam fyf was conuict be ane Suorne assis' thomas chamer
forspekar for trubulance of thomez leslie bailye in word' for the quhilkis he
was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' day Adam fyf was conuict' be ane Suorne assis'
thomas chamer forspekar for trubulance of Niniane blinsele and the said'
Niniane conuict for trubulance of the saide Adam for the quhilkis Ilkan
of thame was in amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amende as law wile
and forber' in tym to cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die
Septembris anno quo supra

The said' day the borghe' fundin one Johne Cuk in ellone be Johne
litstar for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xvi s' was fundyn'
availe be ane Suorne assis' malcome Crag forspekar for the quhilk
the said' Johne Cuk was in Amerciament of the court et cetera and aw to pay the saide
money et cetera Alsua thai ordanit the saide Johne Cuk to bring ane Act
fra the Spirituale Court one Wednisday next eftir the hed' Court day
of this burghe' befor the balyeis that he is quyt of ane
per of Splentis follouit be the said' Johne litstar and falyeing he bring nocht the said' act he
sale pay viij s' for the said' Splentis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvij die Septembris anno quo supra

The said' day thome Walcar' grauntit that he tuk ane forhous'
fra thomas chamer Ande balyes chargit the said' thomas
tile entir to the said' hous' according to his condicioun' and gravnt
it he tuk it for xviij s'

the said day Alexander blakfurd' grantit he hed' borrouit x crovnis
fra thome moir' et cetera Ande hary Scot come Souerte be his hande
gif it be fundin that he is avand' ony money tile to the saide
Alexander he suld' pay it to thome moir' Ande gif he pais nocht
the said' money he sale entir him one monunday in this tolbutht

The saide day hary Scot one that ane part Ande Sandy
blakfurd' one that vthir part oblist thame be the fathtis of thar
bodiis tile abid' at the deliuerance of Richerde Waus Johne
Ramsay Johne Red' and the Skipparis anent ale debatis debatable'
betuix thame quhilkis sal giffurtht thar decret betuix this and
tuisday that nixt cumis be thar athis and the saide Richerd' and Johne
deponit the gret aithe to determe the said' debatis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
die mensis Septembris anno quo supra et cetera

The said day the bailyes continewit the actioun' debatable' betuix gilbert manyeis
one that ane part and margret craufurd' one that vthir part anent the ayr
of vmquhill Alexander red' and' douchtir to the said margret and' hir gudis is conti
newit to wednisday that nixt cummis

The said day thomas Walcar follouit Agnes Waus the relict of vmquhill
thomas saidlar for the wranguis' Intrometing with ane pece claitht quhilkis
sche denyit And' thareftir was put to the decisioun' of ane assis' quhilkis
riply auisit fand and deliuerit that the said Agnes was quyt
of the wranguis' Intrometing of the said claitht be the moutht
of Dauid mar forspekar of the said assis' suorne thar to

The said' day Comperit the Spous' of Johne murray with
William Rolland' hir' forspekar and Requirit the balyeis to ger' call Dauid
Steuart tile Comper be him Self of his procuratoris tile ansuer' to the borghe
fundin one him be Johne murray obefor for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him
of tua franche Crovnis xliiij eduard grotis and demi ane Inglis grot as
ferd' day of process' quhilkis lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit the said'
Williame forspekar fande ane borghe' in the hande of Williame scrimgeor
ane of the officiaris of the said' burghe' that the saide Johne of murray hede
cumyn' to his clame of the Saide some and Recontirit it in defalt of nulle
defence and askit warde and dome tharof Ande nay party comperinge nor'
obieking in the Contrar' the saide partij removit the Court riplie avisit
wardit and It was gevin for dome that the said' borghe' fundin
be the said' Williame Rollande that the saide Johne of murray Recontirit
the saide Some of tua franche crovnis xliiij eduarde grotis and demi Inglis
grotis was availe Ande that the saide Dauid awche to pay the
samyn to the said' Johne of murray et cetera

The said' day Sandy ramsay falyeit in his preiwe assignit to
him to preiwe Wat glenny his feit seruand'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die mensis
Septembris Anno quo supra

The said' day the balyeis continevit the actioun' betuix gilbert menyes
and margaret Craufurd' anent the douchtir and ayr' of vmqhuile Alexander Rede
of be petfodellis is continevit to friday that next cumis but preiudice
tile ony partj

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxiiij die Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander mar' thomas leslie Jonet ogistone and Androw
steuart lauchfullie warnit Callit and Comperit the gret aithe suorn'
deponit that effame leslie douchtir tile elizibetht Stevart is threttene
yeris ald' borne of hir' saide modir

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvij die Sep
tembris anno quo supra

head.add: Assignacio gilberto menyes pro custuma Salmonum

div.p:
The saide day the prouest balyeis and diuers' of the Consale present for the
tyme Assignit to gilbert menyeis four' li' of the his mertimes maile
of Done next to Cum four' li' of the mertimes maile of the said' fischinigis
pertening tile the Relict of vmquhile alexander Red' of the saide
terme Ande lvj s' of patrik chernsidis wattir maile of the forsaide
terme of the pament of the Custome of iiijor lastis and demi of Salmond'
deliuerit to thomas borrow Inglisman in the name of berame Roche
for led' extending to tene fuddir' to Sanct nicholes werk
Ande dischargit and quietclamit the saide gilbert the relict of alexander
Red' and patry chernsid' thar ayris executoris and assignez' for the prouest
balyeis Counsale and communite of the said' of the said' tene li' and xvj
s' now and foreuire

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday that next Cumis to
Sandy ramsay tile ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be alexander
ranisone fra the wranguis' haldin fra him of his seruand' Wat glenny
peremptourlie

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis causit Norman leslie seriand pas' and
distrenyhe Johne mar' talyour for ane new Caldroune pertening to Sandy
and tuk ij eln' of braid' quhit ij eln' threschast carsay quhit and
ij eln' of blak rosat lyning quhilkis was deliuerit to Williame
murray in kepin' for xv dais And' xv dais be Runnyn thai
ordanit the said' Norman to ger' deliuere the said' Caldrone or the
price of It samekile as the saide Alexander findelaw Cane preiwe

The said' day thomas borrow Inglisman grauntit him resauit be the
handis of Androw Cullane prouest of the said' burghe four' lastis
and demi last of Salmonde in the name of bryame Roche for tene fudir
and of led' resauit to Sanct nicholes werk quhilkis iiijor lastis and demi
wate Schippit Custome free Ande the said' thomas in the name
of the said' bryame his mastir helde me wele content and pait
and dischargit and quietclamit the said' prouest balyeis Consale and
communite tharof now and foreuire befor hary Scot skipparis

The saide day Comperit gilbert menyeis burges of the saide burghe
and producit ane lettir of our Souerane lordis vndir the Signet
charging the seref prouest and balyeis to ger' margaret Craufurd'
the Relict of vmquhile alexander deliuer marioun' rede douchtir and
ayr to vmquhile the saide Alexander et cetera to the saide gilbert et cetera quhilkis
lettir being rede the saide margaret frelie deliuerit the saide marion'
hir douchtir to the said' gilbert eftir the tenor of the saide lettir Ande in
continent the saide margaret for carnale affectioun' and fauour and for tendir
hartlines' desirit the saide marioun' Red' agane in hir kepin' at
the said' gilbert Induring his wile quhilkis Supplicatioun' the
saide gilbert vndirstande Consonant to the plesour' of the saide margaret
deliuerit the saide marioun' rede to hir' said' modir in tendir kepin
Induring his wile quhilk barne the said' margret thank
fullie resauit and oblist hir' to conserue and keip hir' and deliuer hir
agane to the said' gilbert at his wile and plesour quhen euere scho
was requirit tharto

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die mensis
Octobris anno quo supra

The said day thomas pill was conuict be ane suorne assis' Johnne of cullane forspekar
for the tribulance of Johnne malisone and fra the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament
of the court et cetera and the said Johnne for tribulance of the said thomas pill bot
nocht so gret tribulance as the said thomas did to the said' Johnne for the quhilkis
the said Johne was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera and to amend' as lave
will et cetera

The said day the bailyeis assignit ane vnlaw to be takin of Johne' berrehill
to be gevin to richerd' Waus for iiij s' quhilk thai aucht to the said richerd' and'
chargit ale the four officiaris to pund the said Johnne berrehill and' mak
pament of four s' to the said richerd'

The said day Alexander ranesone deponit the gret aitht that he licent neuir Watte glenny to
pas fra him bot to reman and mak him seruice to the vschey of his term' eftir the form'
of the condicioun' maid betuix tham and' thareftir the balyes chargit the said Waltir to
pas witht the said alexander and' serue him to the vschey of his terme

head.add: The hed' Court Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo Septimo

div.p:
Curia capitalis balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
quarto die mensis Octobris anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo Septimo

Eodem die gilbertus mengyeis electus fuit in officium prepositure
pro Anno Instanti prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Johannes mar Dauid mar patricius lesly et Willelmus portar
electj fuerunt in officium balliuorum pro anno Instanti prestitis solitis Jura
mentis

Eodem die Willelmus scrimgeour normannus lesly Johannes cuk et andreas
nauchtj electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum dicti burgj pro anno Instanti
prestitis solitis Juramentis

the said day it was statut and ordanit be the prouest bailyes counsaill and
communite that gif ony of the said four seriandis happinis to failye in the exe
cucioun' of thar office for this yeir Instant and' beis tuis' conuict' tharof
the thrid tyme he salbe secludit of his office

Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Johannes spens procuratorium
prioris et conuentus domus predicatorum dicti burgj et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu vj s' et octo d' sibi et dicto loco a longo tempore
debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta anteriore quondam robertj club Jacente in vico
superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram robertj Waus ex
orientali ex vna et terram quondam henricj tulidef ex occidentali partibus
ab altera et terram interiorem dominum Johannis ruthirfurd' versus austrum
et communionem viam regiam versus boream ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit
tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Johanne glenny Andrea scot nor
mundo lesly Sergeando et cetera

Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Johannes spens ut
supra et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu v s'
solidorum vsualis monete scocie dicto loco a longo tempore debito et non
soluto de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico Nauium ex
orientali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram alexandri malisoun' ex orientali et ex vna
et communionem viam regiam ex occidentali partibus ab altera et terram quhondam andree lammynton'
versus autrsum et communionem viam regiam versus boream ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quod balliuis in sacculo presentauit tanquam primo
die huius processus testibus Johanne glenny Andrea scot et normanno lesly Sergeando

Eodem die accend accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Dauid Walcar capel
lanus perpetuus altaris beati leonardj in ecclesiam parrochiali dicti burgi fundati et pro
testabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xxvj s' et octo d' sibi et dicto ca
pellanie sue debito a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta Jacente
infra dictum burgum in le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram quondam
domini Andree gray ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Duncanj clat ex boreali
partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et torrentem sine aque
ductum molendinorum versus occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit dist
ringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit tanquam secundo
die huius processus testibus alexandro brabner alexandro mar Dauid talyour et Johanne
cuk sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram honestus vir Walterus howisone et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu quinquedecim soldiorum vsualis monete scocie de quadam
camera et volta Jacente in le hukstarrawe super duas bothas carnificum et vnam woltam
inferius et terram quondam Johannis hugonis ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam
versus oriens ad quam terram accedens nichill reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit tanquam primo die huius processus
testibus alexandro brabner alexandro moir et Johanne cuk sergeando et cetera

The said day the balyes continewit the process' of Androw lousone in siclik forme'
and' effect as It is now to friday that nixt cummys but preiudice to ony of
the proces' gane of befor et cetera

head.add: Judicium processus ministri domus Sancte trinitatis de Abirdene

div.p:
Eodem die tribus processus perlectis per fratrem Johannem arnot ministrum domum
sancte trinitatis de Abirdene deductis de et super recuperacione propertatis posse
ssionis eiusdem die terre vaste quondam thome cuillan Jacente infra dictum
burgum in le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram alexandri mallison'
ex boreali ex vna et terram quondam domini Andree gray ex australi partibus ab
altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens
indefectu solucionis sex solidorum et octo denariorum monete scocie sibj et domus
sancte trinitatis a longo tempore debito et non soluto vnde dictus frater Johannis pecijt
a nobis secundum vnij formam et effectus in processus precedentis Juris et Justicie
complementum sibi fierj de eadem terra cum pertinenciis Et consequenter dominus Dauid
liell prelocutorio nomine dicti fratris Johannis et conuentus eiusdem porrexit plegium
In manibus Johannis cuk vnius sergeandorum dicti burgj quod ipse fratri Johannis
procuratrio nomine dictus domus proprietatem et possessionem recuperauit legittime
de dicta terra cum pertinenciis in defectu solucionis annuj redditus prenotatis
Vnde hora diej legittime expecta omnibus interesse habentibus vocato et nullo
comparenti nec opponenti decretam fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per
os alexandri Joffrsone Judicatoris curie quod ipse frater Johannis nomine
procuratorio dictus domus causam suam legittime obtinuit' in recuperacione proprie
tatis dicte terre cum pertinenciis reseruato tamen Dauid Walcar' capellano
perpetuo altaris beati leonardj infra ecclesiam parrochialem dicti burgj per
quondam bone memorie Dauid Symsone fundati vno annuo
redditu duarum marcarum et suis Successoribus perpetuus tempor
ibus futuris de eadem Super quibus omnibus et singulis dictus dominus
Dauid prelocutorio nomine quosupra nostras litteras testimoniales
sigillos nostras roborant cum subscripcione notarij publicj subscriptj
reuerencia et debita pecijt et requisunt quam eidem caritatem
concessimus anno die mense prenotatj anno domine decima ponitus Sanctissimi
in cristo patris ac domini domini nostri Julij domina prouidencia pape secundj anno
quarto coram prouidis et famosis viris thoma lesly Johanne murray
Johanne auchneif Waltero howisone roberto murray
Willelmo coupar et Willelmo myln capellanis et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die tribus processibus perlectis per magistrum Johannem marscheall
capellanum perpetuum altaris sancti Ninianj confessorum infra ecclesiam
parrochiali sancti nicholaij de aberdene situati de fundacione dominum de
fyvy de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam
terre vaste Jactente infra dictum burgum in le grene apud locum
fratrem carmelitarum eiusdem inter terras quondam Johannis Durward
ex boreali ex vna et Johannis litstar ex australi ab altera partibus et communies vias regias sine
versus oriens et occidens In defectu solucionis vnius annuj Redditus
sex solidorum et octo denariorum monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj
a longo tempore debito et non soluto vnde dictus magister Johannes
pecijt a secundum vnij formam et effectum huiusmodi suj processus
Juris et Justicie complementum sibi fieri de eadem terra vasta cum
suis pertinenciis Et consequenter Dauid leill prelocutorio nomine
dictj magistri Johannis porrexit plegium In manibus Willelmi scrimgeour
sergeandi quod ipse magister Johannes proprietatem et possessionem recuperans
legitime de dicta terra vasta cum suis pertinenciis in defectu solucionis
dictj annuj redditus Vnde hora legitime expectata omnibus Interesse
habenti vocatis et non comparenti nec opponente decretum fuit per
curiam et datum pro Judicio per os alexandrj Joffrasone Judi
catoris curie quod ipse magister Johannes suam obtinuit
in recuperacione proprietatis dicte terre cum pertinenciis Super quibus
omnibus et singulis dictus dominus Dauid nomine prelocutorio quosupra
a me notario publico subscripto sibi fierj pecijt Instrumentum
vnum aut plura vnam cum singulis balliuorum testibus
Johanne auchneif Roberto murray domino andrea
scot Duncani mar
